description: This simple cocktail, basically a Negroni made with whiskey instead of gin, dates back to the late 1920s, but has recently enjoyed a comeback in bars across the country It even inspired the name of the Dallas restaurant that supplied this recipe.
title: Boulevardier Recipe
text:
This simple cocktail, basically a Negroni made with whiskey instead of gin, dates back to the late 1920s, but has recently enjoyed a comeback in bars across the country. It even inspired the name of the Dallas restaurant that supplied this recipe.
Featured in: The Boulevardier Is Back On The Menu.
